projects.title: Silverster98/bitmips2019
projects.content: We used this work to take part in NSCSCC in 2019. In the competition, we implemented a MIPS cpu and got 14 performance scores in the preliminary. But it is a pity that we didn't enter the finals.

projects.title: bit-mips/bitmips_experiments
projects.content: This is a series of experiments about computer system. It aims at guiding beginner to implement a simple computer system which includes hardware and software.

projects.title: BITNP/BIThesis
projects.content: LaTeX templates for your bachelor graduation thesis (and more) here at BIT.

projects.title: TeamMeow/vscode-math-to-image
projects.content: This is a VS Code extension that helps you convert a standard LaTeX math equation to an image (remote or local SVG which can be embedded inside Markdown files).

gadgets.title: Silverster98/gadget
gadgets.content: This repo contains some useful web tools. "Pixel Draw" allows you to "edit" an image pixel by pixel. You can just click your mouse to change the RGB values of every pixel in an image. "Timing Creator" can let you use code to create a timing figure which is usually used in digital circuit design to indicate temporal relation.

gadgets.title: Silverster98/mips-instruction-tool
gadgets.content: This is a mips instruction tool implemented by Rust. You can translate mips instructions by this tool.
